L

LevelMenu - Class in pyramid.plunder
This LevelMenu Class extends Jpanel; many functions and objectives of the game are met through this class, for example the various options in the Main Menu for the user are created, the pyramid difficulty are set, the shop for materials and resources is created, and the options to buy, sell, and statistics for the materials are able to show-this is randomly selected, a unique feature.
LevelMenu() - Constructor for class pyramid.plunder.LevelMenu
 
LevelRunner - Class in pyramid.plunder
This LevelRunner Class creates multiple platforms for the game, the user is able to select the specific levels which he/she wishes to take part in; the various levels are randomly generated (with the platforms) and six generations are made available for the user.
LevelRunner() - Constructor for class pyramid.plunder.LevelRunner
 
load(String) - Static method in class pyramid.plunder.SaveLoad
In this load method, the String fileName is passed.
loadGraphics() - Static method in class pyramid.plunder.GraphicsManager
This loagGraphics method lists all the images being used in the game.
loadPlayerData(String[]) - Static method in class pyramid.plunder.GameRunner
This GameRunner Class extends JPanel, which is used for the screens, and implements KeyListener, an important facet for the whole game.
logError(String) - Static method in class pyramid.plunder.ErrorLogger
This logError method is passed down String message, and through the if-statement the warning messages are made and the error is logged.
loggedIn - Variable in class pyramid.plunder.StartMenu
 
logMessage(String) - Static method in class pyramid.plunder.ErrorLogger
This logMessage method is passed down String message, through the log and INFO the setup is made.
logNonRecoverableError(String) - Static method in class pyramid.plunder.ErrorLogger
This logNonRecoverableError method receives the String message, and through the if-statement, the error is recorded and the user is prompted.
Loot - Class in pyramid.plunder
This Loot Class extends the PhysicsObject; the image, the weapon, the int location and the int maxValue are implemented; the playability of the loot is also made.
Loot(int[], int[], Weapon) - Constructor for class pyramid.plunder.Loot
The int location, int image, Weapon weapon are passed down to Loot; the location is make and the set size is also implemented.
Loot(int[], int) - Constructor for class pyramid.plunder.Loot
This int location and int maxValue are passed down to Loot; the graphics, location, and size are implemented.
